1.2.0.en: Smappee Connect, Energy and Solar support. Bugfixes and stability improvements.

1.3.0.en: Added EV-Wall charging capability. Fixed cable connected capability and repair screen. Stability improvements.

1.3.1.en: Smappee Plus and Comfort Plug support.

1.4.0.en: Added power meter to devices. Added dim capability to EV-wall. Internal changes.
